cymem¶

Package Contents¶

Classes¶

CymemRecipe()

class cymem.CymemRecipe[source]¶

Bases: pythonforandroid.recipe.CythonRecipe

version = 2.0.3[source]¶
url = https://files.pythonhosted.org/packages/ce/8d/d095bbb109a004351c85c83bc853782fc27692693b305dd7b170c36a1262/cymem-{version}.tar.gz[source]¶

If True, tries to install the module using the hostpython binary copied to the target (normally arm) python build dir. However, this will fail if the module tries to import e.g. _io.so. Set this to False to call hostpython from its own build dir, installing the module in the right place via arguments to setup.py. However, this may not set the environment correctly and so False is not the default.

depends = [][source]¶
cymem.recipe[source]¶
